text: Rättvik Arena is an indoor bandy venue and event arena for music and culture in Rättvik in Sweden. It was opened on 13 June 2010 with performances by music artsts like Kalle Moraeus and Ola Svensson. The arena was completed already by November 2009. The arena originally planned to be taken into use for the 2009/2010 season. ==References== Category:Bandy in Sweden Category:2010 establishments in Sweden Category:Buildings and structures in Sweden
title: Rättvik Arena
